whatIsService.title: What Is HydraFacial?
whatIsService.content:
HydraFacial is a non-invasive skin rejuvenation treatment that combines deep cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, hydration, and antioxidant infusion all in one session.

Unlike regular facials, HydraFacial uses a patented vortex technology to:

Remove dirt, oil, and impurities
Infuse skin with hydrating serums
Deliver immediate radiance with long-lasting results

Safe for all skin types, it’s the go-to treatment for red-carpet-ready glow.

questions.question: Is HydraFacial painful?
questions.answer: No it’s gentle, soothing, and relaxing with no discomfort.

questions.question: How long does the HydraFacial procedure take?
When will I see results from my HydraFacial treatment?
questions.answer: Immediately you’ll notice smoother, brighter, and more hydrated skin after just one session.

questions.question: How many sessions are needed?
questions.answer: One session gives instant results, but monthly treatments maintain long-term glow.

questions.question: Is HydraFacial safe for sensitive or acne-prone skin?
questions.answer: Yes it’s designed for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone skin.

questions.question: Can HydraFacial remove blackheads?
questions.answer: Yes the vortex suction effectively removes blackheads and unclogs pores.

questions.question: How is HydraFacial different from regular facials?
questions.answer: Unlike salon facials, HydraFacial uses medical-grade technology to cleanse, hydrate, and infuse actives deeply into the skin.

questions.question: Can men also get HydraFacial?

questions.question: How long do results last?
questions.answer: The glow typically lasts 2–4 weeks, depending on skin type and lifestyle.

questions.question: Can I do HydraFacial before an event?
questions.answer: Yes it’s perfect as a pre-event treatment since there’s no downtime.
